title: 台日友好！沖繩首里城向國際募資重建　7成捐款來自台灣

replies.msg:
兄弟爬山 點可以少過台灣



沖繩首里城 10 月 31 日凌晨發生火警，包含正殿在內的 7 棟建築物全燒毀，為協助首里城重建，琉球大學的學生在網路上發起募資計畫，截至今（ 6 ）日已募得超過 270 萬日圓，根據官方統計，其中有近 7 成是來自台灣及香港民眾的捐款。

為協助首里城重建，琉球大學的學生在網路上發起募資計畫，除了募集日本國內支援，同時也接受來自世界各地的募資，短短一天內就有超過百萬日圓捐款湧入，截至今日為止，已募得超過 270 萬日圓，根據官方統計，其中有近 7 成是來自台灣及香港民眾的捐款。

發起募資的琉球大學團隊表示，非常感謝日本國內及來自世界各地的支援，大家對於想為首里城重建盡一份心力的心是相同的，雖然歷史建築難以完全恢復是件殘酷的事實，但會帶著大家的祈福及支援，全心全力協助首里城未來的重建之路。

I'll be going on holiday in Okinawa during the Christmas holidays. For tokyo a dazzling sun has been forecast for the whole week. In osaka there's been a long spell of dry hot weather whereas in Kyoto there's been a long spell of wet cold weather just right for cycling. In Hiroshima the weather forecast is for a hot and sunny day and a warm and breezy night tomorrow, just right for swimming. In hong Kong the weather forecast is for sunny spells and scattered rain showers. For Kagoshima light rain and scattered sleet showers have been forecast for tomorrow while for Miyazaki light rainfall and heavy snowfalls have been predicted just right for skiing. For Fukuoka a sunny and breezy day has been forecast just right for sailing whereas for Nagasaki a hail shower and sleet showers have been predicted. In okinawa the weather forecast said it was going to be hot and sunny today. It also stated there would dry sunny spells tomorrow. Of course snow showers and sleet showers are much better than thundery showers and wintry showers. In hokkaido it was sunny earlier but now it's drizzling. Yesterday I forgot my raincoat and umbrella so I got caught in a snow shower while touring the attractions there and a rain shower on my way to the hotel.
